Procedure: 1.2.8 Posing as fictional person in target region

Indicator: The network posted about floods in the Punjab region, the Sikh community worldwide, the Khalistan independence movement, the assassination of Hardeep Singh Nijjar, a pro-Khalistan independence activist in Canada

Technique: 6.2 Amplifying with likely fake accounts on social media
Procedure: 6.2.1 Amplifying with likely fake accounts on Facebook
Indicator: The network amplified one another with fake accounts to give the impression the campaign was more popular than it was.
